name: pdf-to-markdown-plugin
description: Extract the text from a PDF to a Markdown file.

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{ "module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register -r ignore-styles -r jsdom-global/register test/**/*.ts
scripts.test:watch: cross-env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{ "module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register -r ignore-styles -r jsdom-global/register --watch --watch-files src, test/**/*.ts
